name: HyperCoder CodeBlock
author: Cem Demir

sections.description:
CodeBlock is a free WordPress plugin that enables visitors to copy programming code with a single click. It features:

  • A simple lightweight plugin in with no dependencies; the whole package consist of a PHP, a JavaScript and a CSS file (1.92KB)
  • Makes use of short-codes
  • Works with stylized code. That is, it only copies the code not the underlying HTML elements
  • Spam free. It will never bag (ehm, bug) you for ratings, permissions…etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. To use the plugin place your code between [codeblock] or [cb] shortcodes.
sections.faq:
Is there any settings for the plugin?

The plugin has no settings.

Which programming languages does the plugin provide syntax highlighting for?

The plugin does not provide any syntax high-lighting. It simply creates ‘a code box’ with a copy button. You must provide your own syntax highlighted code.
